data.route_analysis: Accessibility via flights to Guatemala City, local transportation options to Antigua, Lake Atitlan, and Tikal.
data.pricing_trends: Airfare tends to dip in September and October, making it affordable for travelers. Accommodations offer discounts during this period.
data.seasonal_patterns: Optimal time to visit Guatemala is from late September to early November due to mild temperatures and fewer travelers.
data.booking_windows: Best to book flights and hotels 1-3 months in advance to avoid price spikes. Most significant pre-holiday travel occurs in early November.

destination_insights.route_analysis: Accessibility via flights to Guatemala City, local transportation options to Antigua, Lake Atitlan, and Tikal.
destination_insights.seasonal_patterns: Optimal time to visit Guatemala is from late September to early November due to mild temperatures and fewer travelers.
destination_insights.climate: The climate is typically cool and dry in autumn. Average temperatures range from 15째C (59째F) to 25째C (77째F). Light layers are recommended for the day and warmer clothes for the evening.
destination_insights.culture: Rich cultural heritage showcasing Mayan history. Autumn festivals include the Day of the Dead celebrations in early November, featuring altars and traditional foods.

market_insights.pricing_trends: Airfare tends to dip in September and October, making it affordable for travelers. Accommodations offer discounts during this period.
market_insights.booking_windows: Best to book flights and hotels 1-3 months in advance to avoid price spikes. Most significant pre-holiday travel occurs in early November.
market_insights.demand: Autumn sees a steady demand, especially around local festivals.
market_insights.competition: Compared to other Central American countries, Guatemala offers unique cultural experiences and lower costs.

trend_insights.market_trends: Growing interest in sustainable tourism and cultural immersion. Eco-friendly accommodations are gaining popularity.
trend_insights.consumer_behavior: Travelers are increasingly seeking off-the-beaten-path destinations, adventurous activities, and meaningful experiences.
trend_insights.competitive_landscape: Guatemala competes with Costa Rica and Mexico, but offers a unique blend of history and natural beauty that stands out.
trend_insights.seasonal_factors: Travel decisions in autumn are influenced by local festivals and climate conditions.
